downloadTitle: Windows 7 Enhancing Privacy and Customer Control
downloadDescription: Windows 7 continues Microsoft’s commitment to Trustworthy Computing by placing privacy at the forefront of the design, development, and deployment of the operating system.

downloadFile.name: Windows 7_Enhancing Privacy and Customer Control_one pager_final.xps
Windows 7_Enhancing Privacy and Customer Control_one pager_final.pdf
Windows 7_Enhancing Privacy and Customer Control_one pager_final.docx

detailsSection: Windows 7 includes enhancements made in Windows Vista that help enhance users privacy, and also includes new innovations that further strengthen privacy features and make them more useable and manageable.

Windows 7_Enhancing Privacy and Customer Control_one pager_final.pdf

systemRequirementsSection:
For XPS viewing: Windows Vista or Windows 7.  The viewer is hosted within Internet Explorer in Windows Vista, but is a native application in Windows 7.  To view XPS documents without a browser, download the XPS Essentials Pack, which includes a standalone viewer and the XPS Document Writer. The XPS Essentials Pack is available for Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, and Windows Vista. 

For PDF viewing: Adobe Reader
installInstructionSection:
Click the Download button on this page to start the download. Then do one of the following:
• To start the installation immediately, click Open.
• To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
